Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.5 Rūpīduka » 2.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.5.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.5.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Cūḷantaraduka
Rūpīduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
130.
846Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta…pe…  namagge satta, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
847Paccanīyaṃ.
